  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the Default Resources to the FXML Stage. FXML Handlers are provided with Event Actions through Lambda Expressions.

      Lambda Expression: FXML Handlers are functional interfaces known as Event Listeners. Rather than passing entire objects that implement the interface, the use of Lambdas here passes a block of code that only runs when the button is clicked.

      (logInButton.setOnAction) Passes username and password fields to JBDC, loads mainMenu.fxml if successful. Throws an SQLException if a connection could not be established.

      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Overrides:
      initialize in class MainViewController
      Parameters:
      url - The filepath of this .fxml file.
      resourceBundle - Abstract Class which retrieves locale-specific objects.

    • checkUpcomingAppointments

      public void checkUpcomingAppointments() throws SQLException
      Identifies Appointments from MySQL which begin within the next 15 minutes and Alerts User of result..
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a connection to MySQL could not be established.

    • updateLogInFile

      public void updateLogInFile(Boolean success) throws IOException
      Prints a standardized output to login_activities.txt indicating when a User attempted to sign-in, whether the attempt was successful, and what username and password combination was tried. (
      Parameters:
      success - Boolean indicator if the user log-in attempt was successful.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an issue arises updating the designated file.
